title: IM GLITCHING
body: I have a leaver buster. When I get into queue it glitches and says there is an unknown error. I tried restarting my computer and game. I have to wait 20 minutes and then it says match found and glitches and I cant accept. please help me

replies.body: I'd like to help you out with this, but need some more information.  At what point is this exactly happening?  For example, is it as soon as you join champion select, or when you are trying to change your masteries runes?  What does the error say exactly?  Any additional information will help!

This could be due to an unstable connection with the LoL servers.

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)


http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/su16_keyart_1920x1080_0.jpg?itok=6nj8mHjj

For bug splats and errors;

Rid yourself of the pests which harass your gameplay by using the [Bug & Crash Exterminator.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) Kha’Zix and Elise won’t know what hit ‘em.
